sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0485 ( DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , PAY_ITEM_CD , ACC_ACC_CD , SEVE_PAY_YN , YRTX_DOTN_CD , YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD , PAYR_TERM_USE_YN , EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN , EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN , EXTPT_DDUC_RNGE_ORD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #emymtDivCd# , #payItemCd# , #accAccCd# , #sevePayYn# , #yrtxDotnCd# , #yrtxFreeDtyReduCd# , #payrTermUseYn# , #extptDducDspyYn# , #extptDducUseYn# , #extptDducRngeOrd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )

INSERT INTO PAYR0485 ( DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , PAY_ITEM_CD , ACC_ACC_CD , SEVE_PAY_YN , EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN , EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #emymtDivCd# , #payItemCd# , #accAccCd# , #sevePayYn# , #extptDducDspyYn# , #extptDducUseYn# , #pymtDducDivCd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0485 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# , PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# , ACC_ACC_CD=#accAccCd# , SEVE_PAY_YN=#sevePayYn# , YRTX_DOTN_CD=#yrtxDotnCd# , YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD=#yrtxFreeDtyReduCd# , PAYR_TERM_USE_YN=#payrTermUseYn# , EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN=#extptDducDspyYn# , EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN=#extptDducUseYn# , EXTPT_DDUC_RNGE_ORD=#extptDducRngeOrd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd#

UPDATE PAYR0485 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , ACC_ACC_CD=#accAccCd# , SEVE_PAY_YN=#sevePayYn# , YRTX_DOTN_CD=#yrtxDotnCd# , YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD=#yrtxFreeDtyReduCd# , PAYR_TERM_USE_YN=#payrTermUseYn# , EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN=#extptDducDspyYn# , EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN=#extptDducUseYn# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
UPDATE PAYR0485 SET EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN = 'N' WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND PAY_ITEM_CD = #payItemCd# AND EXISTS ( SELECT PAY_ITEM_CD FROM PAYR0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PAYR0485 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT PAY_ITEM_CD FROM PAYR0302 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# )
DELETE FROM PAYR0485 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , PAY_ITEM_CD , ( SELECT BB.PAY_DDUC_NM FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD, PAY_DDUC_CD, PAY_DDUC_NM FROM PAYR0470 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# UNION ALL SELECT DPOB_CD, PAY_EXTPY_CD, PAY_EXTPY_NM FROM PAYR0480 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# )BB WHERE DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND PAY_ITEM_CD = BB.PAY_DDUC_CD )AS PAY_ITEM_NM , ACC_ACC_CD , SEVE_PAY_YN , YRTX_DOTN_CD , YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD , PAYR_TERM_USE_YN , EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN , EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN , EXTPT_DDUC_RNGE_ORD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0485 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#
EMYMT_DIV_CD = #emymtDivCd#
PAY_ITEM_CD = #payItemCd#
EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN = #extptDducDspyYn#
EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN = #extptDducUseYn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , PAY_ITEM_CD , ACC_ACC_CD , SEVE_PAY_YN , YRTX_DOTN_CD , YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD , PAYR_TERM_USE_YN , EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN , EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN , EXTPT_DDUC_RNGE_ORD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0485 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EMYMT_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EMYMT_DIV_CD DESC , PAY_ITEM_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT P.DPOB_CD, P.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (P.DPOB_CD, P.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD)AS PYMT_DDUC_DIV_NM, P.PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (P.DPOB_CD, PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD)AS PAY_EXTPY_GRP_NM, P.PAY_EXTPY_NM, P.PAY_EXTPY_USE_YN, P.PAY_EXTPY_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (#dpobCd#, A.YRTX_DOTN_CD) AS YRTX_DOTN_NM, fcBass0300CDNM (#dpobCd#, A.YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD) AS YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_NM, fcBass0300CDNM (#dpobCd#, A.ACC_ACC_CD) AS ACC_ACC_NM, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD, A.PAY_ITEM_CD, A.ACC_ACC_CD, A.SEVE_PAY_YN, A.YRTX_DOTN_CD, A.YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD, A.PAYR_TERM_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_RNGE_ORD FROM PAYR0480 P, PAYR0485 A WHERE P.PAY_EXTPY_CD = A.PAY_ITEM_CD
UNION ALL SELECT R.DPOB_CD, R.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (R.DPOB_CD, R.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD)AS PYMT_DDUC_DIV_NM, R.PAY_DDUC_GRP_CD AS PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (R.DPOB_CD, PAY_DDUC_GRP_CD) AS PAY_EXTPY_GRP_NM, R.PAY_DDUC_NM, R.PAY_DDUC_USE_YN, R.PAY_DDUC_CD, '' AS TEMP1, '' AS TEMP2, '' AS TEMP3, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD, A.PAY_ITEM_CD, A.ACC_ACC_CD, A.SEVE_PAY_YN, A.YRTX_DOTN_CD, A.YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD, A.PAYR_TERM_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_RNGE_ORD FROM PAYR0470 R, PAYR0485 A WHERE R.PAY_DDUC_CD = A.PAY_ITEM_CD ) T WHERE 1=1
T.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#
T.EMYMT_DIV_CD = #emymtDivCd#
T.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD = #pymtDducDivCd#
T.PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD
#dtilPayExtpyGrpCdArr[]#

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT P.DPOB_CD, P.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (P.DPOB_CD, P.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD)AS PYMT_DDUC_DIV_NM, P.PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (P.DPOB_CD, PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD)AS PAY_EXTPY_GRP_NM, P.PAY_EXTPY_NM, P.PAY_EXTPY_USE_YN, P.PAY_EXTPY_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (#dpobCd#, A.YRTX_DOTN_CD) AS YRTX_DOTN_NM, fcBass0300CDNM (#dpobCd#, A.YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD) AS YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_NM, fcBass0300CDNM (#dpobCd#, A.ACC_ACC_CD) AS ACC_ACC_NM, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD, A.PAY_ITEM_CD, A.ACC_ACC_CD, A.SEVE_PAY_YN, A.YRTX_DOTN_CD, A.YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD, A.PAYR_TERM_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_RNGE_ORD FROM PAYR0480 P, PAYR0485 A WHERE P.PAY_EXTPY_CD = A.PAY_ITEM_CD
UNION ALL SELECT R.DPOB_CD, R.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (R.DPOB_CD, R.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD)AS PYMT_DDUC_DIV_NM, R.PAY_DDUC_GRP_CD AS PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (R.DPOB_CD, PAY_DDUC_GRP_CD) AS PAY_EXTPY_GRP_NM, R.PAY_DDUC_NM, R.PAY_DDUC_USE_YN, R.PAY_DDUC_CD, '' AS TEMP1, '' AS TEMP2, '' AS TEMP3, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD, A.PAY_ITEM_CD, A.ACC_ACC_CD, A.SEVE_PAY_YN, A.YRTX_DOTN_CD, A.YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD, A.PAYR_TERM_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_RNGE_ORD FROM PAYR0470 R, PAYR0485 A WHERE R.PAY_DDUC_CD = A.PAY_ITEM_CD ) T WHERE 1=1
T.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#
T.EMYMT_DIV_CD = #emymtDivCd#
T.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD = #pymtDducDivCd#
T.PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD
#dtilPayExtpyGrpCdArr[]#

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT P.DPOB_CD, P.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (P.DPOB_CD, P.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD)AS PYMT_DDUC_DIV_NM, P.PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (#dpobCd#, PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD)AS PAY_EXTPY_GRP_NM, P.PAY_EXTPY_NM, P.PAY_EXTPY_USE_YN, P.PAY_EXTPY_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (#dpobCd#, A.YRTX_DOTN_CD) AS YRTX_DOTN_NM, fcBass0300CDNM (#dpobCd#, A.YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD) AS YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_NM, fcBass0300CDNM (#dpobCd#, A.ACC_ACC_CD) AS ACC_ACC_NM, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD, A.PAY_ITEM_CD, A.ACC_ACC_CD, A.SEVE_PAY_YN, A.YRTX_DOTN_CD, A.YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD, A.PAYR_TERM_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_RNGE_ORD FROM PAYR0480 P, PAYR0485 A WHERE P.PAY_EXTPY_CD = A.PAY_ITEM_CD UNION ALL SELECT R.DPOB_CD, R.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (R.DPOB_CD, R.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD)AS PYMT_DDUC_DIV_NM, R.PAY_DDUC_GRP_CD AS PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD, fcBass0300CDNM (#dpobCd#, PAY_DDUC_GRP_CD) AS PAY_EXTPY_GRP_NM, R.PAY_DDUC_NM, R.PAY_DDUC_USE_YN, R.PAY_DDUC_CD, '' AS TEMP1, '' AS TEMP2, '' AS TEMP3, A.EMYMT_DIV_CD, A.PAY_ITEM_CD, A.ACC_ACC_CD, A.SEVE_PAY_YN, A.YRTX_DOTN_CD, A.YRTX_FREE_DTY_REDU_CD, A.PAYR_TERM_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_DSPY_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_USE_YN, A.EXTPT_DDUC_RNGE_ORD FROM PAYR0470 R, PAYR0485 A WHERE R.PAY_DDUC_CD = A.PAY_ITEM_CD ) T WHERE 1=1
T.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#
T.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD = #pymtDducDivCd#
T.PAY_EXTPY_GRP_CD
#dtilPayExtpyGrpCdArr[]#
